text:
I think we can do better in Julia :)

I put in an application to the Julia Small Grants programme for building a distributed code review system (see also <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/1856|https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/1856> ). The point of that is to share the effort of reviewing dependencies and make the information more useful and easier to use.

I'd also like to do some more work on Sandboxing and capability programming in Julia, which I've started with Sandboxes.jl.

If this work was done then Julia would become much more secure versus dependency attacks, IMO.
